manageProfile: Manage your personal information and account settings.
emailVerificationRequired: To change your email address, you need to verify your current email first. Click the button below to send a verification email.
verificationEmailSent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox and verify your email before changing it.
passwordResetSent: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.

auth.operationNotAllowed: Email verification required. Please verify your current email address before changing it. You can request a verification email from your account settings.
auth.emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already in use by another account.
auth.noEmail: No email address found for this account.

general.updateProfileFailed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
